name: Yaru's MoreIsBetter Pack
description:
(Made for http://itch.io/jam/moreisbetter)

Two games with awful graphics and even worse names!

"Keys fly at you for no clear reason": Push the keys to destroy the evil letters that move towards you for some obscure reason!

"Squares and Keys": Move in a dungeon and try to find all the tiny squares that are supposed to be keys that you need to exit before the countdown reaches zero and everything goes kaputt!
